'''The Houses of Healing''' is the eleventh track of disc three of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King - The Complete Recordings]]'' by [[Howard Shore]].
The song was sang by actress [[Liv Tyler]]. It was written originally for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers|The Two Towers]]'', but the creators could not find a place for it. So, they decided to put it in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King|The Return of the King]]'', as a song played in "[[The Houses of Healing (scene)|The Houses of Healing]]" scene.

==Lyrics==
<poem style="font-style:italic; margin-left:20px;">
With a sigh you turn away,
With a deepening heart,
No more words to say,
You will find that the world
Has changed forever.

And the trees are now turning
From green to gold,
And the sun is now fading,
I wish I could hold you closer.
</poem>
